column4: Hi, does anyone know how to get hp pavillion dv2745se's wireless driver to work on ubuntu
Better if you find out what chipset that computer uses for wireless
You want to seach for broadcom ubuntu wireless .. should be some forums for that what release are you using?
could have rebooted without proper close down from win
I haven't used my wireless card in a while so I haven't had to mess with it
Maybe it is the access point
I mean when you were asking fbern if he was dual-booting
is there another wireless manager you can use? I remember using a different wireless manager when I had to use my card
Oh... yah I remember something about having to set up the restricted-manager too.... hmmm
I don't think it has to do with that, i think it is a header file or something.. been a long time
Im sure there is a way to get it to work.. what is the access point config yo are trying to connect to
But what type of encryption are you using
do you have option for wpa?
For some odd reason my brain is telling me I had better luck with WPA than with wep..ie.. I could only connect when using wpa
Im saying maybe the wireless is working but not able to connect cause its wep
oh ha.. i gotta reboot brb hopefully!
